confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete?
pwa_install_desc: Add the app to your home screen for quick access
about_intro: Mahatati is your comprehensive fuel stations directory. We help you find the nearest fuel station and know its status and available fuel types.
about_feature_1_desc: Browse all registered fuel stations and know their current status.
about_feature_2_desc: View station locations on the map with navigation support.
about_feature_3_desc: Register your station and manage it easily through your dashboard.
about_feature_4_desc: We verify all registered stations to ensure data accuracy.
contact_intro: We'd love to hear from you. For any inquiries or feedback, don't hesitate to reach out through the following channels.
privacy_section_1_desc: We only collect data necessary to operate the service, such as station information and contact details.
privacy_section_2_desc: We use your data to display station information to users and improve service quality.
privacy_section_3_desc: We are committed to protecting your personal data and do not share it with third parties without your consent.
privacy_section_4_desc: You have the right to request deletion or modification of your data at any time by contacting us.
terms_section_1_desc: By using the Mahatati application, you agree to these terms and conditions.
terms_section_2_desc: We strive to provide accurate information but are not responsible for any errors in data provided by station owners.
terms_section_3_desc: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account data and all activities carried out through it.
terms_section_4_desc: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. You will be notified of any significant changes.
donate_desc: Help us develop and improve the Mahatati app by donating to the following account.
forgot_password_desc: Enter your email and we'll send you a password reset link.
reset_email_sent: Reset link sent to your email ✉️
password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
